title: (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 19 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Fixed 
Payment Notice and Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) (Amendment) (No. 
2) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 18th day of December

title: (Amendment) Act 2020 (No. 19 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for certain penal provisions in Regulations made 
under Section 31A of the Health Act 1947 to be fixed penalty provisions.
